Texts.Eng:
Humans are well rounded, and terrifying in their ability to survive almost anywhere. Ever met one of these things? They are a strange bunch. I advise avoiding them.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Energy x^green;1.05^reset;
  +^green;2^reset;% Jump Height, +^green;15^reset;% Max Food
  +^green;10^reset;% Charisma
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^cyan;11^reset;% Electric,+^cyan;10^reset;% Fire, Ice, Poison, Cosmic

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  None

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Ammo Mastery: ^green;25^reset;%
  Shortsword Mastery: ^green;15^reset;%
  Shield: Perfect Blocks ^green;increase defense^reset;(stacks)

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;15^reset;% Radioactive, Shadow
